summary: Replaces the Dunmer flame cloak ability with a \"Summon Ancestor Guardian\" spell.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Summon Ancestor Guardian
Version: 0.1
Date: 12/3/2011
Author(s): Somokon

Description
===========
Small mod that replaces the Dunmer flame cloak power with a \"Summon Ancestor Guardian\" spell.
The summon will last until death and uses a sword along with flame spells.

This first release hasn\'t been playtested much, so I would appreciate feedback, especially on how the spell balances at different levels.

Install
=======
1. Extract the .zip archive
2. Copy files to your skyrim\\Data\\ folder
3. Start the Skyrim Launcher, click \'Data Files\', place a checkmark beside SummonAncestorGuardian.esp

Uninstall
=========
1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck SummonAncestorGuardian.esp

History
=======
0.1, 03/12/2011 - Initial release
author: Somokon
